name: Watermalone Killer
description:
I present to you, Watermalone Killer, the best watermelon ejuice you'll vape.

If you like Water-malone, consider that a thing of the past.

Welcome to the new breed of candied watermelon brilliance.
author: NOVITEC

reviews.text: Bold statement but seems true for me. Although, the original tends to focus on a real watermelon flavor so the comparison is unfair. This is a delicious candied watermelon! I doubled the recipe except for the SS and put it at 18mg in my Caliburn and it tastes phenomenal!

TPA key lime has small trace amounts of vitamin e in it . it was tested by some one i seen in a video of on all these flavors being tested and this and one other had it .  Idk knows why tpa dose this but then again this is afood flavor .  look the video up on youtube . wayne on diyordie made the video i believe
